Author: PetarM
Title: [ANN] Crypto Asset Rating - Rating for ICO and Security Tokens issuing [ANN]
Body: Crypto Asset Rating Inc. is an independent rating agency based in the US. We are on our mission to bring trust to the crypto market.  We are launching a US-SEC Compatible Crypto “Security” tokens. There will be two tokens – Token “AND” for Accredited Investors and Token “ANSA” for Investors outside USA.   Key Unique Things about “AND” and “ANSA” Tokens  ·         AND &  ANSA – Both Tokens are Security Tokens  ·         Crypto Asset Rating Inc. – Legally filed for exemption with SEC for 506(c) under Regulation D for the token AND  ·         ANSA token available under Regulation S of SEC  ·         AND and ANSA tokens will have 12 months Lockup timeframe  ·         ANSA tokens not available for USA resident  ·         Crypto Asset Rating Inc. is a USA based Registered Corporation                                                                                                                               Links                                                                                                        Website: www.cryptoassetrating.com                                                                                                                                                      Telegram: https://t.me/CryptoAssetRating                                                                                                        Twitter: https://twitter.com/RatingCrypto                                                                                                   Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RatingCrypto                                                                                                     Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/crypto-asset-rating
